Software Engineer - Position Summary
Our client is seeking motivated software engineers with a passion for game development and the .NET Framework. As part of a small, tight-knit game team, successful candidates will have the opportunity to leverage their expert coding and specifically, C# coding skills in all aspects of game development.
Essential Skills and Qualifications
- C# expertise - windows application development experience in C# - basic understanding of all aspects of game development - ability to take ownership of problems and deliver solutions - strong ability to learn independently - strong communication and teamwork skills - a desire to deliver serious, innovative solutions making the most of the .NET Framework
Additional Assets
- DirectX experience (Managed DirectX experience is even better) - audio programming experience - previous commercial software development experience, most applicably games - .NET-based, data-driven web application development experience
